name: Budgeter
description: ![license badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/license--blue)   # Budgeter   ## DESCRIPTION   A simple web app to allow you to set your budget, track finances, and deposit and withdraw from a bank account that is available online/offline.    ## TABLE OF CONTENTS   * [Installation](#installation)   * [Usage](#usage)   * [License](#license)   * [Contributing](#contributing)   * [Testing](#testing)   * [Questions](#questions)   ## INSTALLATION   Please run `npm i ` in the command line to install dependencies.   ## USAGE   make sure to have the db setup properly for offline use.    ## LICENSE   This project is licensed under the  license.   ## CONTRIBUTING   commit often   ## TESTING   To run tests, please run `node server.js` in the command line   ## QUESTIONS   All inquiries can be sent to mfitzpatrick95@gmail.com, and be sure to check out more of my GitHub projects at [realMattyFitzz](https://www.github.com/realMattyFitzz)!
